Articles.Content:
I just brought the KSP at steam market.. and the game crash when it finish loading... can i know what happen to the game.. it is my computer error or other problem

**** Crash! ****

Have you tried verifying your file integrity with steam? Or re-installing? Those are usually my first two ports of call with issues.

How much installed RAM do you have? Not VRAM, the actual hardware.

Well, this is the wrong log file, BUT I have a suggestion.

Open the settings.cfg file and find the line that says texture quality. Change it to read TEXTURE_QUALITY = 1 (or maybe even try 2 or 3). Then restart KSP.

If that doesn't work, see this post on what kind of information we need to help better: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Cheers,

~Claw
